MURGU 𒈱𒋞 ⇔ मार्ग mārga (road) march ⇔ Meer?

MA.EGIR 𒈱 길 gil ڕێگە rêge орук oruk < سڑک saṛak street

𓈘 = maroadan 𓐝 𓂝 𓏏 𓈖 𓌙 𓈐 𓂻
𓈘 𓏤 𓊢 𓂝 𓏏 𓉐| mastaba / murod staette

𓌻 𓂋 𓂋 𓏏 𓉕 𓉐||street, avenue (of statues)|maur-road++ ⇔ मार्ग mārga marode > 馬路 ma.lu™ mall
𓌻 𓂋 𓂋 𓏏 𓊋||street, avenue (of statues)|maraud ! (vagabond) taur.road ⇔ (s)treet

𒋻 esirra :
𒋻 SILA calla < 𒌵 tilla 𒀭𒀹𒀭 tilla₅ < 𒋻 TAR track > شَارِع šāriʕ <> 𒂊 𒁍 ;𒂊 𒋓 e-sir₂ e-sir spreet ≈ street? 𒋻 KU course

𒀭𒁹𒀭 ≈ 𓊖

𒌵 tillaᶜ < track 𒋻 TAR 𒀭𒀸𒀭 tilla₂ 𒀭𒁹𒀭 tilla₃ 𒀭𒀸𒀀𒀭 tilla₄ 𒀭𒀹𒀭 tilla₅ 𒀭𒀭 tillaₓ > calla street

𒀭𒀹𒀭 #sūqu شَارِع šāriʕ Strecke < ˢtrack 𒋻 TAR track

𒋢𒇻 su-lu calla
𒋢𒇻 lane, street ⇔ 𒇻 rue

rodh raster रास्ता rāstā

𒃼𒊑𒋾 gar-ri-ti Gerade road "straight" street

cobble plaza

𒌒 ˢUB in 𒌒𒇷𒀀 ˢUB.LI.A 𒋢𒇻 #sulû 𒋻 SILA street

𒌒 ᶜUP in 𒌒𒇷𒀀 ᶜUB.LI.A •coblia calla < 𒌵 tilla 𒀭𒀹𒀭 tilla₅ < •tyblia ᵗUB.LI.A

𒌒 ᶜUP in 𒌒𒇷𒀀 ᶜUB.LI.A •coblia cobblestone pavement 𒌒 ᶜUP 𒇷 GUB₂LIᵗʰ 𒀀 bu Kopfsteinpflaster calque

𒌒 UP > P in 𒌒𒇷𒀀 up-liᵗ-a ⲡⲗⲁⲧⲓⲁ platia πλατεῖα plateîa փողոց pʿołocʿ plaza <> platt flat palace place path

𒌒 UB > Uᵛ in 𒌒𒇷𒀀 ub-li-a ublia úᵇlica у́лица úlica street वीथी vīthī via
